name: Geomancer
aura: Increase Ally HP in in all Battles by 25

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Tremor Staff
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Removes all buffs from a target enemy, then attacks them.

Steals all buffs instead if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion.

Reduces the cooldown of Quicksand Grasp by 2 turns if the target is killed by this Skill while under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion.
skills.name: Creeping Petrify
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Fully depletes the target’s Turn Meter. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by the amount the target loses.

Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] and a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 3 turns.
skills.name: Quicksand Grasp
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Decreases the damage all allies receive by 15% and deflects that damage onto each enemy under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this Skill, only one will activate.

Whenever this Champion is attacked, deflects 30% of the damage instead. When deflecting damage, on each enemy hit, has a 30% chance of dealing additional damage equal to 3% of the target's MAX HP.
skills.name: Stoneguard [P]
